comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Lilla Brokaw Gilbert Renshaw Coleman (1892-1975); wife and widow of Howard Price Renshaw (1886-1920): query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10D10F7345517738... www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=86795467 www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=38452972 In 1933 there's mention of Mrs. H. P. Renshaw marrying her second husband Joseph G. Coleman Jr. of Chicago: select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F30A1EF83D551673... "Miss Lila" is also in this photo: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2404816631/] This was her mother: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8079897288/] This was her sister Florence: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8079897524/]

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The baby in the photo may be her son John Paine Renshaw (1916-1995), or her daughter Lilla Price Renshaw (later Mrs. Phelps Stokes Hunter).

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: thanks for the background information and links.  We will update the record.
